events.message: I recently bought a laptop from your store, but I just noticed the screen has a large scratch on it. This is really disappointing as I expected a brand new product.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to reports of physical damages such as scratches on the product received.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this case regarding the reported product defect.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I am sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I'm here to assist you in resolving this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and let us know if you still have the original packaging and receipt?
I have attached several images showing the scratch from different angles. I still have the packaging and the receipt from my purchase last week.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I appreciate the prompt response. I would prefer a replacement laptop as I really need it for work.
We have initiated the process for sending you a replacement laptop. You will receive a tracking number as soon as the shipment is dispatched.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is working as expected.
Thank you for confirming receipt of the replacement. We are closing this case now, but please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
